name: Prisms
description:
P R I S M S

A short piece for #Elevate Storyjam. Sprawling and epic horrendously unfinished tribute to my stepfather.

××× WARNING ×××

Currently appears to be a slow and solemn meditation on missed opportunities, punctuated by Brechtian commentary on the futility of creation. This is due to me failing to implement about 85% of the design in the time limit.

Don't complain, you get what you pay for innit.
